questions.question: In the simulation bench of the ring compression test, the ram speed of the die is:

explanations.a: Correct — These speeds are commonly used in the simulation bench.

questions.question: Which of the following may not be the friction between the specimen and the dies in the simulation bench of the ring compression test:

explanations.c: Correct — 1.5 is unrealistic for metal forming friction.
explanations.d: 0.45 is possible for high friction cases.

questions.question: In the ring compression test of the specimen, the specimen is deformed by:

explanations.b: Correct — RCT compresses the ring between dies.

questions.question: In the simulation bench of the ring compression test, the outer and inner diameter of the specimen before testing is:

explanations.a: Correct — Standard ring used is OD=60mm, ID=30mm.
explanations.b: Incorrect — Not used in RCT simulations here.
explanations.c: Incorrect — Too large for bench simulation.

questions.question: In the simulation bench of the ring compression test, the initial height of the specimen is:

explanations.a: Incorrect — 10 mm is the reduced height after 50% reduction.
